= POV-Ray instructions =
The POVRay scripts are in "svn\trunk\helper_scripts\povray". After converting Datsville using L3P version 1.4, delete any camera and light statements, and delete all the color and material definitions in the "Defines" section, replacing them with a reference to "ldr_wrapper_mapview_1.4.inc". Render the scene at 6144 x 3072 pixels. This will produce the isometric image I use in my town maps. You'll need a lot of RAM, but it won't take a lot of time to render once it's done parsing.

You will probably need to install the 64 bit version of POV-Ray as Datsville consumes huge amounts of RAM. You should probably also render Datsville with the "+q7" flag set when creating the maps.
